actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to place signs memorializing the New River Gorge Bridge as the world's largest steel-arch span bridge.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to permit the erecting of signs memorializing the New River Gorge Bridge in West Virginia as the world's largest steel-arch span.

titles.title: A bill to place signs memorializing the New River Gorge Bridge as the world's largest steel-arch span bridge.
